example.eg: Sometimes it can be hard to tell a copy from the original.
example.egtrans: 有时很难区分原件和复印件。

example.eg: I have just read an abridged novel, but I prefer the original.
example.egtrans: 我刚读了一本小说的精简本，但我更喜欢原著。

example.eg: The portrait did justice to the original.
The editors liked the story because it was original.
example.egtrans: 编辑喜欢这个故事，因为它很新颖。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 新颖的, 不同的, 独创的

example.eg: Make copies of the original document.
The expert confirmed that the painting was an original Picasso.
example.egtrans: 专家认定，那幅画是毕加索真迹。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 原版的, 真版的, 真品, 真迹

example.eg: He brought an original style of thinking to the long-established group.
example.egtrans: 他给那个成立已久的团体带来了独创的思维方式。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 有独到见解的, 独创的

example.eg: The Maori were the original inhabitants of New Zealand.
example.egtrans: 毛利人是新西兰的原住民。

example.eg: Having copied the storyline he could not claim the tale as his original work.
example.egtrans: 他的故事线是抄袭来的，不能说是自己原创的作品。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 首创的, 独创的, 原创的

example.eg: There have been many rock stars, but Elvis Presley was a true original.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 独一无二的人, 绝无仅有的人

example.eg: After the quarry was filled in, the developers had promised to restore the land to its original condition.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 初始状态, 原始状态

example.eg: The book had never been removed from the shrink wrapping, and was in original condition.

dsense.name: original copy
dsense.guideword: (artwork: not a replica or a fake) (艺术品)

example.eg: Eve giving in to the serpent's temptation is a metaphor for original sin.
The cinema screened the film in its original version.
I prefer the original version of the movie.
